title: Pay to legalise documents using the premium service
tagline: Figures for applications processed on GOV.UK for the service to pay the Foreign & Commonwealth Office (FCO) to use the premium service to get a UK public document 'legalised' â€“ this means a signature, seal or stamp made by a UK public official on the document is confirmed as genuine by the UK government. This premium service is only available for registered businesses.

modules.title: Live service usage
modules.description: Live number of users on any page within the service
info: Shows the estimated number of users currently accessing the service on GOV.UK.

modules.title: Completed applications
info: Completed applications count based on unique visitors to the final page of the service.

modules.title: Completion rate
info: Completion rate measures the proportion of people who started an application and were able to complete it.
It is calculated as percentage of unique visitors who arrived at the final page of the service out of those who arrived at the start page.

modules.title: Users at each stage
modules.description: Number of users who completed important stages of the transaction last week
info: The total number of users who arrived at each stage.
Number of users is measured using the count of unique events from each stage.

modules.title: Service availability
info: Page load time measures the time taken for a sample page within the service to load.
Uptime measures the percentage of time that the service was observed to be available.
